title: Desperate Lives
description: Librarian's note: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B00DCXG2JA.Lela E. Buis presents dark fantasy and speculative fiction stories of people in desperate situations, looking for ways to survive.These are stories about people in need, finding each other in the shadows. There are witches, sorcerers, vampires, and ordinary people caught in extraordinary circumstances within these pages. Includes violence and sexual situations.
author: Lela E. Buis
